section.heading: Misleading filings.
section.text: A person shall not make, or cause to be made, in a document filed with the Commissioner or in any proceeding under this chapter, a statement which is, at the time and in the light of the circumstances under which it is made, false or misleading in any material respect.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 31-5606.04.
